mapper.select: SELECT d.`VALUE`, d.IMAGE_URL FROM dict d WHERE d.SORT = 'CAR_BRAND' LIMIT 0, 16
SELECT c.IMG_URL, (SELECT d.`VALUE` FROM dict d WHERE d.`KEY`=c.CAR_BRAND AND d.SORT='CAR_BRAND') CAR_BRAND, c.GUIDE_PRICE FROM c_car c WHERE c.LEVER = #{carType}
SELECT cc.name, SUM(o.NUMBER) number FROM o_order o LEFT JOIN c_car cc ON cc.ID = o.CAR_ID WHERE o.CAR_ID IN (SELECT c.ID FROM c_car c) GROUP BY cc.ID LIMIT 0,5

SELECT (SELECT d.`VALUE` from dict d WHERE d.`KEY` = c.CAR_BRAND AND d.SORT='CAR_BRAND') brand, c.DEALER_QUOTATION, c.DISCOUNTS, c.DISPALCEMENT, c.GUIDE_PRICE, (CASE WHEN c.HOT=1 THEN '热门' ELSE '冷门' END) IS_HOT, c.ID, c.IMG_URL, c.INVENTORY, c.LEVER, c.`name`, c.OIL_WEAR, c.SECOND_HAND_PICE FROM c_car c WHERE c.ID = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(c.ID) FROM c_car c LEFT JOIN dict d ON d.`KEY` = c.CAR_BRAND

SELECT d.`VALUE` brank, c.DEALER_QUOTATION, c.DISCOUNTS, c.DISPALCEMENT, c.GUIDE_PRICE, (CASE WHEN c.HOT=1 THEN '热门' ELSE '冷门' END) IS_HOT, c.ID, c.IMG_URL, c.INVENTORY, c.LEVER, c.`name`, c.OIL_WEAR, c.SECOND_HAND_PICE FROM c_car c LEFT JOIN dict d ON c.CAR_BRAND = d.`KEY`
LIMIT #{carSelectDto.countPageStart},#{carSelectDto.pageTotal}
